Description: The Michael Kelly Patriot Standard Electric Guitar is an ideal choice for the guitarist on a budget, sporting qualites usually reserved for more expensive models. It features a distinctive, basswood body with set-neck construction and extended reach cutaway. Michael Kelly designed pickups offer some high-power tones via a master volume and tone controls and a 3-way switch.The Patriot is easy to play with a 24.75" scale and a comfortable neck profile with medium-jumbo frets. Other appointments includes a rosewood fretboard with pearl bone inlays, chrome hardware, a tune-o-matic bridge and die-cast tuners. Case sold separately.For over a decade, the Patriot has been one of the most award-winning archtop single cutaways on the market. Just pick up one to see why it has earned all of the critical acclaim. Each model has a deeply arched top and the most in-demand features.
